pages.text: khushaʿan absaruhum yakhrujuna mina l-ajdathi ka-annahum jaradun muntashirun
muh'tiʿina ila l-daʿi yaqulu l-kafiruna hadha yawmun ʿasirun
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin fakadhabu ʿabdana waqalu majnunun wa-uz'dujira
fadaʿa rabbahu anni maghlubun fa-intasir
fafatahna abwaba l-samai bimain mun'hamirin
wafajjarna l-arda ʿuyunan fal-taqa l-mau ʿala amrin qad qudira
wahamalnahu ʿala dhati alwahin wadusurin
tajri bi-aʿyunina jazaan liman kana kufira
walaqad taraknaha ayatan fahal min muddakirin
fakayfa kana ʿadhabi wanudhuri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
kadhabat ʿadun fakayfa kana ʿadhabi wanudhuri
inna arsalna ʿalayhim rihan sarsaran fi yawmi nahsin mus'tamirrin
tanziʿu l-nasa ka-annahum aʿjazu nakhlin munqaʿirin
fakayfa kana ʿadhabi wanudhuri
walaqad yassarna l-qur'ana lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
kadhabat thamudu bil-nudhuri
faqalu abasharan minna wahidan nattabiʿuhu inna idhan lafi dalalin wasuʿurin
a-ul'qiya l-dhik'ru ʿalayhi min baynina bal huwa kadhabun ashirun
sayaʿlamuna ghadan mani l-kadhabu l-ashiru
inna mur'silu l-naqati fit'natan lahum fa-ir'taqib'hum wa-is'tabir
